name: Marshadow
author: Emi Ando
flavor_text: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

abilities.name: Let Loose
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may have each player shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Shadow Punch
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
